Package hospital.staff

Class Professional

java.lang.Object
hospital.staff.User
hospital.staff.Professional
All Implemented Interfaces:
UndoRedoExecutor, java.io.Serializable
public class Professional
extends User
Represents a professional in the hospital staff.
See Also:

    • searchAvailability

      public java.util.List<Appointment> searchAvailability​(java.time.LocalDateTime from, java.time.LocalDateTime to)
      Finds all available slots for a possible appointment and returns a List of available appointment slots with start ane end times specified.
      Parameters:
      from - data range to search from
      to - data range to search to
      Returns:
      List of free slots for appointments that has data of start and end time

    • addAppointment

      public boolean addAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
      Registers a new appointment in the professional's electronic diary. Checks if it's allowed and if there are now conflicts with the already booked appointments.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the new appointment to register in the professional's electronic diary.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment addition was successful, false if it wasn't

    • deleteAppointment

      Returns:
      the deleted appointment.

      Parameters:
      taskName - - name of the task
      description - - description of the task
      dueBy - - date when the task is due by
      Returns:
      true or false whether the addition was successful
